title: 💻 What is Cybersecurity?
content: Cybersecurity is like a superhero shield that protects computers, phones, and data from bad guys on the internet. It helps keep your personal information safe!

title: 🎣 How to Spot Phishing Emails?
content: Phishing emails are like fake treasure maps! They try to trick you into giving away passwords or money. Look for spelling mistakes, strange links, and messages that sound too good to be true!

title: 🔒 Why Strong Passwords Matter?
content: A strong password is like a secret code that only you know! Make sure it's long, has letters, numbers, and symbols like '@' or '!' to keep hackers away.

title: 🌐 Safe Internet Browsing Tips
content: Only visit websites that start with 'https://', never share your personal info, and avoid clicking on ads that look suspicious.

title: 👀 Beware of Online Strangers!
content: Not everyone online is who they say they are! Never share your address, school name, or pictures with people you don’t know.

title: 📱 Social Media Safety
content: Think before you post! Once something is online, it stays there forever. Set your accounts to private and only add real friends.

title: 🛑 What is Cyberbullying?
content: Cyberbullying happens when someone is mean online. If you see it, don’t respond—tell an adult and block the person!

title: ⚠️ What to Do If You Get Hacked?
content: Change your passwords, log out of all devices, and tell an adult or a teacher if something seems wrong with your account.

title: 🕵️‍♂️ How to Identify Fake News?
content: Not everything online is true! Check if the news comes from a trusted website and compare it with other sources before believing it.

title: 🔍 The Importance of Privacy Settings
content: Privacy settings help control who can see your posts, photos, and personal info. Always check your settings and keep them private!

title: 🚀 The Future of Cybersecurity!
content: One day, you can become a cybersecurity expert too! By learning these safety tips now, you are already protecting yourself online!
